mapper.select: select basicaction.basic_id, basic_name, basic_name_e, basic_explain, basic_explain_e, basic_img_path, basic_movie_path, basic_clear, basic_score, basic_locked from basicaction, basicstage where basicaction.basic_id = basicstage.basic_id and user_id=1;
